documentation.text:
@notice Mark to market function that is called periodically to transfer gains/losses
 @dev Collateral req. is checked and if party is unable to satisfy collateral requirement by next m-to-m then default.
@notice Settle and close contract at expiry.
@notice Withdraw link from forward contract callable by ForwardFactory contract

@notice Returns current contract state.
 @return Current contract state.

@notice get long party
 @return address of long party

@notice Mark to market function that is called periodically to transfer gains/losses
 @dev Collateral req. is checked and if party is unable to satisfy collateral requirement by next m-to-m then default.
@notice Settle and close contract at expiry.
@notice Withdraw link from forward contract callable by ForwardFactory contract

@notice Returns current contract state.
 @return Current contract state.

@notice get long party
 @return address of long party

params.amountStillOwed: Amount of collateral still owed by lsoing party after defaulting.

params._collateralTokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 collateral token.
params._longPersonalWallet: Address of the long party's personal wallet
params._shortPersonalWallet: Address of the short party's personal wallet

markToMarket().details: Collateral req. is checked and if party is unable to satisfy collateral requirement by next m-to-m then default.

defaultContract(address,uint256).notice: Defaults contract and transfers all collateral of defaulting party to toher party.

initiateForward(address,address,address,.notice: Initiate forward contract and send link to oracles.

markToMarket().notice: Mark to market function that is called periodically to transfer gains/losses

settleAtExpiration().notice: Settle and close contract at expiry.

withdrawLinkFromContract().notice: Withdraw link from forward contract callable by ForwardFactory contract
